title: Trump says he was 'very active' despite public absence
shortDescription: President Donald Trump addressed online speculation about his health after a lapse in public appearances. 'I was very active over the weekend.'

title: Appeals court allows Trump's EPA to nix climate grants
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's administration can proceed with terminating $16 billion in grants awarded to non-profit groups to fight climate change

title: Trump on social media reports questioning his health: 'It's fake news'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump responded Tuesday to social media reports questioning his health after going two days without holding a news conference.

title: Trump says he will ask Supreme Court to rule quickly on his tariffs
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he will ask the Supreme Court to save the tariffs that are the centerpiece of his economic agenda – and to do so on an expedited basis.

title: Woody Allen wants to direct 'very good actor' Donald Trump again
shortDescription: Woody Allen says he would gladly direct Donald Trump in a film again, more than two decades after the former New York City real-estate developer appeared in Allen’s 1998 movie 'Celebrity.'

title: Trump says troops are going to Chicago: 'We’re going in'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he plans to send the National Guard into Chicago after the city suffered violence on Labor Day weekend.

title: What is Space Command? Trump moves headquarters to ‘Rocket City,’ Alabama
shortDescription: The headquarters for US Space Command will be on the move under a new decision from the Trump Administration. What to know about the military command.

title: Trump to award Giuliani Presidential Medal of Freedom after car crash
shortDescription: President Donald Trump will award his former lawyer and former New York City Mayor Rudy Giuliani the Presidential Medal of Freedom.

title: Chicago mayor signs order to reject Trump's threatened troop deployment
shortDescription: Chicago police will not collaborate with National Guard troops or federal agents if President Trump deploys them to the city, Mayor Brandon Johnson said.

title: Watch Trump announcement today: Where has he been?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has on his schedule an announcement. Did Donald Trump pass away? No, he has been golfing. See his recent photos.

title: Trump family's crypto windfall could hit $5 billion
shortDescription: World Liberty Financial lists President Trump and Steve Witkoff, his diplomatic envoy, as co-founders emeritus.

title: Trump National Guard deployment ruled illegal
shortDescription: Judge Charles Breyer says President Donald Trump’s use of the National Guard in L.A. broke the Posse Comitatus Act.

title: Trump moving military space HQ to Alabama
shortDescription: The Sept. 2 announcement reverses a move by President Joe Biden overturning Trump's 2021 decision to move Space Command to Alabama

title: Over 1,000 anti-Trump Labor Day protests held across the US
shortDescription: Labor unions and community activists organized widespread protests on Labor Day as part of demonstrations against the Trump administration.

title: Congress faces potential government shutdown. Here's what to know.
shortDescription: A partial government shutdown looms Oct. 1 unless Congress can overcome partisan bickering and a loss of trillions in tariffs to keep the lights on.

title: Judge blocks Trump deployment of National Guard in California
shortDescription: A federal judge blocked President Donald Trump's deployment of the National Guard in California, citing the 'ongoing risk' of violating federal law.

title: Congress is back, shutdown looms
shortDescription: Congress faces a possible government shutdown as Democrats push back on GOP budget cuts and demands.

title: Where’s Barron Trump? NYU classes start for very private public figure
shortDescription: The president and Melania, Donald Trump Jr., Ivanka, Eric, Tiffany, Vanessa, Kai, and Donald Trump III have made headlines. But where's Barron?

title: Daily Briefing: Congress' summer break is over
shortDescription: Lawmakers face a tight deadline to fund the government. Here is the news to know on Tuesday.

title: China's Xi convenes 'Axis of Upheaval' in Beijing, sidelining Trump
shortDescription: China's President Xi Jinping convened his Russian and North Korean counterparts together for the first time on Tuesday.

title: Epstein files and a possible shutdown: The heat is on in Congress
shortDescription: As lawmakers return from August recess, tensions loom over the federal budget, the Epstein files and redistricting.

title: Longtime Rep. Jerry Nadler won't seek reelection
shortDescription: U.S. Rep. Jerry Nadler, D-N.Y., announces he won't seek reelection in 2026.

title: 'Generational change:' Longtime Democratic Rep. Jerry Nadler won't seek reelection
shortDescription: Jerry Nadler, a more than 30-year veteran of Congress, announced he will not run for reelection.
